articles.description: Durand Cup 2023 is all set to commence from the 3rd of August and will be played across four cities.
articles.content: The Local Organizing Committee (LOC) of the 132nd Durand Cup football tournament, today announced Shillong in Meghalaya and Kokrajhar in Assam, as the newest host cities for the legendary football to… [+1974 chars]

articles.author: Rujuta Thete
articles.title: Media Organisations Incorrectly Report That Sweden Declared 'Sex as a Sport' - The Quint
articles.description: Fact Check of Sweden Sex Championship 2023: Swedish Sports Confederation confirmed to us that Sweden has not declared sex as a sport. Confederation  is also not holding any 'sex competitions' in the country under its wing.
articles.content: Anna Setzman, Head of Communication and Press from Swedish Sports Confederation, dismissed the claims and said, "The Swedish Sports Confederation has drawn attention to the fact that in some parts of… [+205 chars]

articles.title: Dushmantha Chameera's four wickets leads bowlers' party as Sri Lanka wrap up series - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He was helped by Wanindu Hasaranga and Lahiru Kumara, before a blazing fifty by Pathum Nissanka crushed Afghanistan
articles.content:
ReportHe was helped by Wanindu Hasaranga and Lahiru Kumara, before a blazing fifty by Pathum Nissanka crushed Afghanistan
Andrew Fidel Fernando is ESPNcricinfo's Sri Lanka correspondent. @afidelf
